newsitem.title: USA: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS -- Issues to watch - April 24.
newsitem.headline: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS -- Issues to watch - April 24.

text.p: * International Business Machines Corp shares were up one at 143-3/8 in London overnight after the company reported first quarter earnings that matched the highest Wall Street estimates. The stock rose 2-3/8 Wednesday.
* U.S. Robotics Corp rose to 48 in after-hours trading from a Nasdaq close of 47 after reporting higher fiscal second quarter results.
* Netscape Communications Corp traded at 27-3/8 after hours Wednesday, compared to its close of 27-1/2, following the release of quarterly earnings.
* AlliedSignal Inc is expected to report first quarter earnings per share of $0.92, up from $0.80 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 73-3/4.
* CSX Corp is expected to report first quarter earnings per share of $0.70, compared to $0.69 a year ago, according to First Call.
* American Express Co is expected to report first quarter earnings per share of $0.92,compared to $0.80 a year ago, according to First Call.
* Dow Chemical is expected to report first quarter earnings per share of $1.72, compared to $1.90 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 79-3/4.
* Amoco Corp said it expected earnings from its chemical business to be relatively flat worldwide both this year and in 1998. The stock closed at 83-1/2.
* Halliburton Co rose 1/8 to 74 in London after the company on Wednesday reported first quarter earnings per share surpassing the First Call mean estimate.
* American International Group Inc is expected to report first quarter earnings per share of $1.50, compared to $1.38 a year ago, according to First Call. AIG closed at 118.
* Unocal Corp is expected to report first quarter earnings per share of $0.71, compared to $0.45 a year ago, according to First Call. The shares closed at 37-1/2.
